Text:
Oh this is a nice rare treat.

Thanks !

oh, btw, if you have anymore Box albums please upload! I posted their greatest hits a couple years ago and it can be found here

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4269040/The_Box_-_Always_in_Touch_With_You_(Best_Of)_[FLAC]_-_Kitlope

Thanks, Kitlope. I added your torrent as soon as I saw your comment.

I think I have All the Time, All the Time, All the Time on cassette, but haven't the equipment or expertise to transfer it.

no worries, ripping from cassette is a time consuming experience and the sound more often than not can be brutal.

Do a search with my name and you'll find tons of Canadian music , some of it being a bit rare to find.

Looking forward to more Canadiana!
And we also need a seed, we're stuck at 91.3%
